00022 #ifndef INCLUDED_GR_CHECK_COUNTING_S_H
00023 #define INCLUDED_GR_CHECK_COUNTING_S_H
00024 
00025 #include <gr_sync_block.h>
00026 
00027 class gr_check_counting_s;
00028 typedef boost::shared_ptr<gr_check_counting_s> gr_check_counting_s_sptr;
00029 
00030 gr_check_counting_s_sptr gr_make_check_counting_s ();
00031 
00038 class gr_check_counting_s : public gr_sync_block
00039 {
00040   friend gr_check_counting_s_sptr gr_make_check_counting_s ();
00041 
00042   enum state {
00043     SEARCHING,          // searching for synchronization
00044     LOCKED              // is locked
00045   };
00046 
00047   state                 d_state;
00048   unsigned int          d_history;              // bitmask of decisions
00049   unsigned short        d_current_count;
00050   
00051   long                  d_total_errors;
00052   long                  d_total_shorts;
00053 
00054   gr_check_counting_s ();
00055   
00056   void enter_SEARCHING ();
00057   void enter_LOCKED ();
00058 
00059   void right (){
00060     d_history = (d_history << 1) | 0x1;
00061   }
00062   
00063   void wrong (){
00064     d_history = (d_history << 1) | 0x0;
00065     d_total_errors++;
00066   }
00067 
00068   bool right_three_times () { return (d_history & 0x7) == 0x7; }
00069   bool wrong_three_times () { return (d_history & 0x7) == 0x0; }
00070 
00071   void log_error (unsigned short expected, unsigned short actual);
00072 
00073  public:
00074 
00075   int work (int noutput_items,
00076             gr_vector_const_void_star &input_items,
00077             gr_vector_void_star &output_items);
00078 };
